inspire.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something
inspire.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We need someone who can inspire the team.
Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
He inspired many young people to take up the sport.
I hope this success will inspire you to greater efforts.
inspire.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make someone have a particular feeling or react in a particular way
inspire.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Gandhi’s quiet dignity inspired great respect.
The hospital’s record does not inspire confidence.
inspire.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to give someone the idea for something, especially a story, painting, poem etc
inspire.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
a range of designs inspired by wild flowers
